content: Enhance multi-party payment processing with advanced commission splitting and multi-currency support
Implement comprehensive client payment features (secure processing, saved methods, split payments, refunds)
Build advanced payment features (tips, subscriptions, gift cards, corporate billing)
Implement security and compliance features (PCI DSS, fraud detection, chargebacks, encryption)
Create comprehensive API controllers and routes for all payment functionality
Build frontend components for payment processing and instructor financial management
Implement automated payout system with customizable schedules
Add comprehensive payment webhooks handling and event processing
Create payment analytics and reporting dashboards
